title: The Amazing World Of Stuart
description: Sara Pennypacker's two bestselling Stuart books are now available in paperback and feature full-color illustrations!!!Praise for Stuart!!!STUART'S CAPE"A sure-fire winner." - KIRKUS"Matje's pen-and-ink artwork amplifies the quirky humor." - PUBLISHER'S WEEKLYSTUART GOES TO SCHOOL -"Hilarious and clever." - KIRKUS" . . . wryly funny mix of the real and magical . . ." - BOOKLIST
author: Sara Pennypacker
